paragraph: Gregory Tardy is an American jazz saxophonist, who has released albums for the record labels SteepleChase Records, J Curve Records, and Impulse! Records. As of May 2015 he is teaching at the University of Tennessee, Knoxville. He has played with Elvin Jones, Avishai Cohen, Aaron Goldberg, Brad Mehldau, and Joshua Redman, among others.
The Art Of Rhythm (RCA Bluebird, 1998)With Andrew Hill
El Trilogy (RCA/BMG, 2001)With Brian Lynch/Eddie Palmieri Project
